node.title: Mobile developer
node.text:
#–≤–∞–∫–∞–Ω—Å–∏—è  #android  #developer  #java  #senior  #remote  #–∏–Ω–Ω–æ–ø–æ–ª–∏—Å         

Android Developer
Company: NNG
Vacancy: Senior Android Developer
Location: Innopolis, Kazan
Work format: #remote
Employment: full time
S/p: from 180 to 200 k net

At NNG we develop the next generation of navigation and infotainment technology to improve driving experience, working with 7 of the top 10 car manufacturers worldwide. Headquartered in Hungary, we have a global footprint with coverage in almost 200 countries and 12 company offices worldwide. We have recently established a new development center in Kazan, tasked with delivering customized cutting-edge solutions to Russian vehicle manufacturers. In addition, the Kazan office will also develop independent, reusable software components for the global market, primarily frontend software (JavaScript, iOS and Android) and Java backend microservices.

What would be your job? 
üîπWork on mobile and automotive navigation software development
üî∏Work on various projects with international clients from all parts of the world
üîπWork in close cooperation with project managers and development teams both locally and in the Budapest office
üî∏Design, develop, code, test and debug; own your code
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                If you have...
üîπExperience developing, testing, and releasing Android apps
üî∏Knowledge of Java and Android UI development
üîπ Experience collaborating with designers on usability and aesthetics of apps
üî∏ Strong experience in writing and maintaining testable code and unit tests
üîπ Experience with git-based version control systems
üî∏Strong written and verbal communication skills in English
üîπExperience working with global teams

moreover, you have any of the following: 
üî∏Familiarity with JavaScript
üîπ Familiarity with Flutter
üî∏Experience in Agile development, especially SaFE and SCRUM
üîπWillingness to get familiar with new technologies
üî∏Experience in working as a team player

What can we give you in return? 
üîπA job at a successful global company in Innopolis, where you can learn from the best
üî∏Serious professional challenges
üîπA secure and well-paid job
üî∏The opportunity to develop the navigation software of the future in the present
üîπ A youthful team
üî∏The opportunity of working abroad for several weeks

Contacts: hr.vkulneva@gmail.com, @viktoriyakulneva
